mapper.insert: INSERT INTO adminLog(admin_idx, log_type, target_table, operation_detail, log_time, ip_address) VALUES(#{admin_idx}, #{log_type},#{target_table},#{operation_detail}, #{log_time}, #{ip_address})
mapper.select:
SELECT d.dept_name, u.user_name, al.* FROM adminLog al JOIN user u ON al.admin_idx = u.user_idx JOIN dept d ON d.dept_idx = u.dept_idx
AND u.dept_idx = #{dept_idx}
AND al.log_time >= CONCAT(#{startDate}, ' 00:00:00')
AND al.log_time <= CONCAT(#{endDate}, ' 23:59:59')
ORDER BY log_idx DESC LIMIT 100
